name: Robert Martins
description: I am a single dad who is looking to build a good relationship.. I am a very affectionate person and I love to cuddle, I like to show somebody how I feel not just telling them. I love to be close to somebody whether it is in the bed on the couch or wherever. Yes I am looking for something long term, but I do know that it takes time and effort to build a solid relationship. I have been single . I guess because I am scared of suffering heartbreak and the games. I need that special one that will have eye on me alone and be committed to me alone…
